title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - November 15, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled game update on Wednesday, November 15, 2023 at 5:00 AM PST (8:00 AM EST / 2:00 PM CET / 12:00 AM AEDT).

title: Scheduled Maintenance - November 21, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance on Tuesday, November 21, 2023 at 6:00 AM PST (9:00 AM EST / 3:00 PM CET / 1:00 AM AEDT).

title: Community Livestream - Let's Play Hyperion w/ CM Jade
content: Join Community Manager Jade in the next Community Livestream as she explores the new server, Hyperion, and gets to know the players!

title: New Age Hyper Burning and Burning World!
content: The New Age update is here, and Hyper Burning is back once again until February, with Burning World and Burning World Step Up to take you all the way to Lv. 260!

title: Maple Memo: v.246 New Age Update Clarification
